wikipedia_page.main: John G Rowan (16 August 1890 – 4 December 1963) was a Scottish footballer who played for Dumbarton, Hamilton Academical, and Dunfermline Athletic.

response: *John Rowan (Kentucky politician) (1773–1843), politician and jurist from the U.S. state of Kentucky
*John Rowan (psychologist), author, counselor, psychotherapist and clinical supervisor
*John Rowan (Vietnam War veteran), sixth National President of Vietnam Veterans of America
